chart_description: This chart tracks the rate at which IP multicast packets are received and transmitted in packets per second (packets/s). It is useful for monitoring multicast traffic in a network, especially for troubleshooting issues related to multicast routing and connectivity.

dimension_descriptions.InMcastPkts: This dimension represents the rate at which incoming IP multicast packets are received in packets per second (packets/s). It reflects the traffic that originates from other hosts and is destined for the current host.
dimension_descriptions.OutMcastPkts: This dimension represents the rate at which outgoing IP multicast packets are transmitted in packets per second (packets/s). It reflects the traffic that originates from the current host and is destined for other hosts.
